extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of 6.0 units from GPHY227or GPHY228 or GPHY229 or DEVS200 or DEVS230.

basic.description: Contemporary urban and regional development from the perspective of marxist political economy. Emphasis on the geography of industrial and regional restructuring, more flexible forms of manufacturing and service provision, and the economic and social restructuring of cities.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Cities, Regions and Planning in Capitalist Societies
